title: Benjamin Danso
text:
Benjamin Danso (born 9 January 1984) is a German <a href="List%20of%20Germany%20national%20rugby%20union%20players">international</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, playing for the <a href="Heidelberger%20RK">Heidelberger RK</a> in the <a href="Rugby-Bundesliga">Rugby-Bundesliga</a> and the <a href="German%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">German national rugby union team</a>.
Danso played in the 2011 and 2012 German championship final for Heidelberger RK, which the club both won.
He plays rugby since 2004. He originally played for the <a href="DRC%20Hannover">DRC Hannover</a> in the Bundesliga but left the club after its relegation in 2009 to join Heidelberger RK. He made his debut for Germany in 2006 in a game against Switzerland. His final match was in 2016, in a test between Germany and Spain in Cologne.
